title: Word Collocation Education for ESL Learners: Integrating Strategic Instructional Methods with Self-Directed Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental grasp of English grammar and vocabulary
context.additional_context: Blended online/offline learning environment utilizing digital devices, where learners apply word collocation in authentic contexts through project-based tasks and engage in self-directed learning via web-based dictionaries and text analysis tools

learning_goals: Learners can analyze grammatical collocations, transitivity, and complement relationships in actual texts with 80% accuracy
Learners independently apply strategies to investigate word collocation using web-based dictionaries and text analysis tools at least three times
Learners perform creative writing based on collocation understanding through project outputs, achieving at least 70% incorporation of peer and instructor feedback
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
